definition: better to have nothing (than substandard choice) (idiom); would prefer to go without than accept shoddy option
would rather/to prefer/how (emphatic)/Taiwan pr. [ning2]
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
old variant of 寧|宁[ning4]
peaceful/to pacify/to visit (one's parents etc)
variant of 寧|宁[ning2]
deficiency/lack/scarce/vacant post/to run short of
(literary) no/don't/to not have/nobody
surname Wu
overflowing/excessive/indiscriminate

sentences.english: I've been patient, believing the best is worth the wait.
sentences.chinese: 一直坚持宁缺毋滥，相信最好的值得耐心等待。

sentences.english: We has been patient, believing the best is worth the wait.
sentences.chinese: 我们一直坚持宁缺毋滥，相信最好的值得耐心等待。

sentences.english: When buying clothes, I go by the principle of quality over quantity.
sentences.chinese: 对于买衣服，我的原则是宁缺毋滥。

sentences.english: She has been patient, believing the best is worth the wait.
sentences.chinese: 她一直坚持宁缺毋滥，相信最好的值当耐心等候。

sentences.english: More and more people marry later nowadays. We should put quality before quantity.
sentences.chinese: 在现今人们结婚的年龄越来越晚，我们应该宁缺毋滥。

sentences.english: She has been patient, believing the good is worth the wait.
sentences.chinese: 她一直坚持宁缺毋滥，信任最好的值得耐心等待。

sentences.english: Tell the hiring manager what he wants to know and nothing more.
sentences.chinese: 告诉招聘经理他希望了解的，宁缺毋滥。

sentences.english: We must put quality before quantity; We should rather go without than have something shoddy.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须重视质量，宁缺毋滥。
请慎重选择你的人际关系，宁缺毋滥。

definition: same as 寧缺毋濫|宁缺毋滥[ning4 que1 wu2 lan4]
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
to seek a marriage partner/looking for a mate
"leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)
unmarried/single

lit. if you have to use force to break a melon off the vine, it won't taste sweet (because it's only when the melon is ripe that it can be removed with just a slight twist) (idiom)/fig. if sth is not meant to be, it's no use trying to force it to happen
pinyin: qiang3 niu3 de5 gua1 bu4 tian2

definition: fickle in love/sentimentality
to insist on/to demand/to impose
satisfied just to get through (idiom); to muddle through/without high ambitions, but getting by
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
lit. say three in the morning but four in the evening (idiom); to change sth that is already settled upon/indecisive/to blow hot and cold
can't reach the high or accept the low (idiom); not good enough for a high post, but too proud to take a low one
pinyin: gao1 bu4 cheng2 di1 bu4 jiu4

definition: to choose a spouse
single-minded/concentrated
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
